page.title: 18West Kingsdown and shopping
page.content:
{West Kingsdown}is poorly served for amenities of all kinds. It has{little {local employment, one group medical {practice and no dentist.}There is no library, secondary school or public park.
There is{one central parade of shops, with a small supermarket, greengrocer, post office/newsagent, hairdresser, chemist, fish and chip shop and hardware shop. Apart from this central parade there is an{off-licence}on the {A20}and{three shops near the school,}a dress shop, electrical goods and motor-cycle accessories shop.
This local paucity of shopping facilities serves to increase the {"dormitory town"}feel of the place to include{Saturdays,}when{shopping}is done{away from the village.
